name: monster-hunter-hack
title: Monster Hunter Hack
author: Alex Hall
description: A hack of PF2e for adventures in the world of Monster Hunter!

hunter.label: Hunter
hunter.description: A feat with this trait can only be taken by someone with Guild Hunter Training.

specialized.label: Specialized
specialized.description: When you take a Specialized feat, you must select one of it's specialization options. That feat then inherits the rarity of the specialization. A specialization of a feat can be retrained after a day of downtime at no cost.

counter.label: Counter
counter.description: An action with this trait can be used as reaction, typically with differing effects when done so. Any reaction taken this way gains the move trait.

mounting.label: Mounting
mounting.description: A Strike with this trait deals mounting damage equal to a single roll of the weapon's unmodified damage dice. If an activity would increase a weapon's motion value (die size), it does not increase mounting damage, unless specified.

build-up.label: Build-Up
build-up.description: This attack is particularly good at status or elementalblight build-up; if the weapon deals status or elemental damage, you can have all of the damage done by an action with this trait deal that damage instead.

charged.label: Charged
charged.description: An action with this trait can have multiple actions spent on it to increase an effect of that action.

follow-up.label: Follow-Up
follow-up.description: An action or activity with this trait will always state another action or activity. The first activity must always follow the listed one, even across turns or rounds.

physical.label: Physical
physical.description: This attack is bad at delivering elemental damage and status build-up. Any element or status on the weapon deals minimum damage instead of rolling.

heavy.label: Heavy
heavy.description: A weapon with this trait will always have a Strength requirement. It adds 2x the wielders Strength modifier to damage, instead of just the modifier.
